程序包 org.janusgraph.hadoop.scan

类 HadoopScanRunner

java.lang.Object
org.janusgraph.hadoop.scan.HadoopScanRunner
public class HadoopScanRunner
extends Object
Utility class to construct and submit Hadoop Jobs that execute a HadoopScanMapper.

  • 方法详细资料

    • runJob

      public static ScanMetrics runJob​(Configuration conf, String confRootField, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration hadoopConf, Class<? extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputFormat> inputFormat, String jobName, Class<? extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper> mapperClass) throws IOException, InterruptedException, ClassNotFoundException
      Run a ScanJob on Hadoop MapReduce.

      The confRootField parameter must be a string in the format package.package...class#fieldname, where fieldname is the name of a public static field on the class specified by the portion of the string before the #. The # itself is just a separator and is discarded.

      When a MapReduce task process prepares to execute the ScanJob, it will read the public static field named by confFieldRoot and cast it to a ConfigNamespace. This namespace object becomes the root of a Configuration instantiated, populated with the key-value pairs from the conf parameter, and then passed into the ScanJob.

      This method blocks until the ScanJob completes, then returns the metrics generated by the job during its execution. It does not timeout.

      参数:
      conf - configuration settings for the ScanJob
      confRootField - the root of the ScanJob's configuration
      hadoopConf - the Configuration passed to the MapReduce Job
      inputFormat - the InputFormat<StaticBuffer, Iterable<Entry>> that reads (row, columns) pairs out of a JanusGraph edgestore
      jobName -
      mapperClass -
      返回:
      metrics generated by the ScanJob
      抛出:
      IOException - if the job fails for any reason
      ClassNotFoundException - if scanJob.getClass() or if Hadoop MapReduce's internal job-submission-related reflection fails
      InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting for the Hadoop MapReduce job to complete
